events.name: Lithium Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including data collection, system dynamics modeling, and scenario building.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including data collection, system dynamics modeling, and scenario building.

events.name: Data Collection
events.wd_description: Determine the global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015 and the estimated lithium demand in the years 2015 to 2025.
events.description: Determine the global lithium supply from 1981 to 2015 and the estimated lithium demand in the years 2015 to 2025.

events.name: System Dynamics Modeling
events.wd_description: Analyze the dynamic behavior of stocks and flows in the supply chain of lithium.
events.description: Analyze the dynamic behavior of stocks and flows in the supply chain of lithium.

events.name: Scenario Building
events.wd_description: Estimate the lithium supply between 2015 and 2025 considering different growth rates in the production capacity of the world suppliers.
events.description: Estimate the lithium supply between 2015 and 2025 considering different growth rates in the production capacity of the world suppliers.
